page.title: 06A schoolday in Marnhull.
page.content: At school we first went into service and after the last hymm we listened to a girl play her flute.In class we did maths for a long time and then it was playtime.After play we had sewing. I was making patchwork.After about half an hour I went back and finished my tissue paper pictue.We played before lunch and when the whistle blew went into dinner.I ate my sandwiches. After lunch I changed into my plimsolls for country dancing.At 2.30 p.m.we went out to play during which we had to get ready for athletics.When I got home I changed into my leotard and tracksuit to go to gym at the school. When I got home again I had a pizza to eat, put on my pyjamas and switched on my electric blanket.At nine o'clock I went to bed with a drink of lemon squash.
